name: kent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in southeastern England: She was on her way to Kent for the weekend. A Kent police officer showed them his badge.
More examplesFewer examplesHe and Jane liked to drive into Kent, where they had friends.Ruth runs a treatment centre near the south coast in Kent. They drove most of the remainder of the journey in silence, speeding through Kent into West Sussex.
